title: Urban-rural cleavage challenge both Mex. and China

content.question: Mexico and China both face challenges in policy making with respect to

choices.label: the creation of special economic zones for indigenous peoples
popular blame placed on migrants for rising violence and criminality
the influence of the Roman Catholic Church in policy making
protests over regional and global free trade agreements

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
